message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $180 is a bit high, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway!
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we settle at $110?
I'm not quite ready to go to $110, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $145?
